name: Yellow Fellow
description:
Browser Play has some controller support glitches and slight lag issues, There is a download for Mac that fixes most problems and upgrades game performance. There is also an experimental windows version that as of now has not been tested. Let us know if you have problems downloading the game. About this game

Yellow Fellow is a colorful and charming arcade style game about turning people yellow. Try to get the fastest time while running around trying to catch thise pesky little fellows!

Controls There is full controller support for this game, however on browser the controller acts up often, as some inputs don't work, so for the best browser experience, use the keyboard, sorry :(

Here are the control options:

AcceptNextSkipZoomWalkEnter key, Space Bar,  A Button (XBOX), DualShock Cross (Playstation), and B Button (Nintendo).Z key,  A Button (XBOX), DualShock Cross (Playstation), and B Button (Nintendo).X key,  B Button (XBOX), DualShock Circle (Playstation), and A Button (Nintendo).Space Bar,  Left Trigger, Right TriggerArrow Keys, D-pad, Left Analog Stick Credits and Future Updates Coming Soon

Game Design: Trace

Programming: Tob

Art: Tob & Trace

Playtester: Trace

If this game gets enough plays, we will consider doing updates such as options, new modes (time trials, local co-op, ect.), free skins or hats, and high-score saving, but this is for the FAR future...

Mods

We have added the files to the game to allow for full modding support, so go crazy and put the link to any mods you made in the comments. Enjoy :)
